channel.title: Need help asap on richscape server
channel.description: Help...this happend to me twice: i was trading a friend because we were doing theiving and comparing how much we stole... one day i traded then declined and i lost 45M it dissapeard after trade... 2 days later i trade again...to my friend and this time it was 50M ...then it dissapeard plz some1 help me im using richscape client and i play on there serv my username is Ownagemax84 Plz help...thats almost 100m lost...idk if you can get it back to me oh and also every 45 minutes or so i get connection lost and it wont let me logg back in for like 10-20mins idk wats up with that. [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] Ban me, pwnd_ is too lazy.[/center]

2 days later i trade again…to my friend and this time it was 50M …then it dissapeard

Plz help…thats almost 100m lost…idk if you can get it back to me
